synopsis: In this engaging episode of Pineapple Blend Rotation, hosts Devam and Ahir dive deep into the intricacies of work-life balance, sharing personal experiences and insights that resonate with many young adults today. They explore the importance of self-awareness, the impact of societal expectations, and the journey toward finding fulfillment in both work and life.
quotes: Quote of the Day: 'If you're working so much, it's like you stop feeding your soul.'
‘The point is to just share what we've learned through our journeys and talk to each other.’
‘It's not about number of hours necessarily; you can burn out working 50 hours a week.’
‘What would love have me do today?’
‘Life happens between the work hard and play hard.’
‘You can’t create anything if you’re just consuming all the time.’
‘You have to explore and see what you enjoy.’
‘What does it mean to be moral in the face of violence?’
‘You deserve to feel whole and full at the end of the day.’
‘The journey is about staying in touch with yourself as much as possible.’
